ConnectionString.description: Gets or sets the connection string of the Couchbase server to connect to.

DisableHealthChecks.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the Couchbase health check is disabled or not.

DisableTracing.description: Gets or sets a boolean value that indicates whether the OpenTelemetry tracing is disabled or not.

HealthCheckTimeout.description: Gets or sets a integer value that indicates the Couchbase health check timeout in milliseconds.
